attributes.action: WRITE TO EACH MEMBER OF THE ARMED FORCES POSTED OUT TO IRAQ & AFGHANISTAN AND PERSONALLY WISH THEM WELL AND THANK THEM FOR THEIR COURAGE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For too long members of parliment have only ever thanked our troops when their is the media present or a photo opportunity, we are aking the Prime Minister to prove he cares and write to each member of the British Forces posted out to Iraq & Afghanistan individually and thank them for their courage and wish them well for their tour of duty.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
